pr_title: Ensure that SplitBrainProtection configs are not overwritten during parsing

timeline.message: Ensure that SplitBrainProtection configs are not overwritten during parsing
Ensure that SplitBrainProtection configs are not overwritten during parsing
Ensure that SplitBrainProtection configs are not overwritten during parsing

timeline.bodyText: I think we need a test for a non-existent config as well. We rely on getting a non-null config for config.getSplitBrainProtectionConfig(name) in MemberDomConfigProcessor, but it's not tested.
timeline.author: blazember

replies.bodyText:
There are no non-existent configs. They get instantiated on get (just like our data structures).
 /**
  * Returns a config for the given name, creating one
  * if necessary and adding it to the collection of known configurations.
  * (...)
  */

Notice that this test actually fetches a non-existing "foo" config at the beginning
replies.author: pivovarit

replies.bodyText: Ignore this comment, it is tested by the existing config builder tests.
replies.author: blazember

timeline.bodyText: I see that the merge introduced some empty lines here. Will remove them in the next change.
timeline.author: pivovarit
